ing: 6 tablespoons powdered chocolate-flavored malt drink mix (such as OvaltineÂ®)
des: "This is a yummy nutritious shake that you can have for breakfast or a snack. There are also variations you can make to make it healthier or tastier. For a healthier smoothie, add 1 tablespoon wheat germ. If you care more about taste than nutrition, use a chocolate-milk mix like NesquickÂ®, and use 1/2 cup vanilla yogurt in place of the plain yogurt and vanilla extract."
ins: Blend milk, strawberries, yogurt, chocolate-flavored malt drink mix, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.
